repeatable.title: Repeatable
repeatable.description: Whether the page or component lets users ‘add another’ answer

repeatable_minimum.title: Minimum number of repeatable items
repeatable_minimum.description: For example, if users must give at least 3 answers, set this to 3 - the page will show 3 inputs when it loads

repeatable_maximum.title: Maximum number of repeatable items
repeatable_maximum.description: For example, if users can give up to 5 answers, set this to 5

repeatable_heading.title: Repeatable section heading
repeatable_heading.description: Heading for repeatable items - appears once before the components

repeatable_add.title: Text to add another answer
repeatable_add.description: Specify the link text for users to add another answer - defaults to ‘Add another’

repeatable_delete.title: Text to remove an answer
repeatable_delete.description: Specify the link text for users to delete an answer - defaults to ‘Remove’
